profile.name: Your Name
profile.description: A brief description about yourself, your skills, and what you're passionate about. Keep it concise but engaging - around 2-3 sentences.

education.degree: Bachelor/Master of Science in Computer Science
education.description: Brief description of your academic achievements, relevant coursework, or activities during your education.
Additional educational background or certifications that are relevant to your career.

portfolio.title: Project Name
portfolio.description: A detailed description of what this project does, the problems it solves, and your role in its development. Highlight key features and technologies used.

portfolio.title: Another Project
portfolio.description: Description of another significant project you've worked on. Focus on the impact and technical challenges you overcame.

portfolio.title: Side Project
portfolio.description: Personal project that showcases your skills and interests. Can be experimental or hobby-based.

experience.description: Describe your responsibilities, achievements, and impact at this company. Focus on quantifiable results and technologies you used.
Description of your previous work experience, highlighting skills developed and projects completed.
Brief description of your internship experience and what you learned.
